cast.overview: The UK Prime Minister and US President have a public rivalry that risks their countries' alliance. But when they become targets of a powerful enemy, they're forced to rely on each other as they go on a wild, multinational run. Allied with Noel, a brilliant MI6 agent, they must find a way to thwart a conspiracy that threatens the free world.
cast.title: Heads of State

cast.overview: Racing legend Sonny Hayes is coaxed out of retirement to lead a struggling Formula 1 team—and mentor a young hotshot driver—while chasing one more chance at glory.
cast.title: F1

cast.overview: Against the vibrant backdrop of a 1960s-inspired, retro-futuristic world, Marvel's First Family is forced to balance their roles as heroes with the strength of their family bond, while defending Earth from a ravenous space god called Galactus and his enigmatic Herald, Silver Surfer.
cast.title: The Fantastic 4: First Steps
cast.character: Lynne Nichols / F4 Chief of Staff

cast.overview: A girl dying of leukemia compiles a list of things she'd like to do before passing away. Topping the list is her desire to lose her virginity.
cast.title: Now Is Good

details.biography:
Sarah Niles (born 17 June 1987) is a British film, television and theatre actress. She is best known for her roles in Fantastic Four: First Steps, F1: The Movie, and Heads of State (all 2025), as well her Emmy Award-nominated performance as Dr. Sharon Fieldstone in the Apple TV series Ted Lasso.

Her other works include Mister Eleven and Beautiful People (2009), Thorne: Sleepyhead (2010), Spotless (2015), Catastrophe (2015–2019), Trust Me (2019), I May Destroy You and Trying (2020), Viewpoint (2021), and Riches and The Sandman (2022).
details.name: Sarah Niles
